sentences.sContent: The relationship to nature is an important part of the school's pedagogic concept.
sentences.sContent_eng: The relationship to nature is an important part of the school's pedagogic concept.
sentences.sCn: 与自然的联系是该学校教育理念的重要组成部分。

sentences.sContent: Class assumes remote in time or space of pedagogic dark mouth child (Song Longzi is acted the role of) disregard this disorder right-down, make final confess to students silently.
sentences.sContent_eng: Class assumes remote in time or space of pedagogic dark mouth child (Song Longzi is acted the role of) disregard this disorder right-down, make final confess to students silently.
sentences.sCn: 级任教师森口悠子（松隆子饰）全然无视这片混乱，静静地向学生们做出最后的告白。

sentences.sContent: The pedagogic vectors such as menu items, field labels, ToolTips, and instructional hints are language dependent, and thus must be the subject of localization via translation to appropriate languages.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pedagogic vectors such as menu items, field labels, ToolTips, and instructional hints are language dependent, and thus must be the subject of localization via translation to appropriate languages.
sentences.sCn: 学习途径，如菜单项、字段标签、工具提示和说明提示和语言相关。 因此必须本地化，翻译为恰当的语言。

synos.tran: 教师的（等于pedagogical）；教育学的；教授法的

remMethod.val: ped(= child 儿童) + agog(引导) + ic → 教育学的

words.tran: （小学）教师；喜欢卖弄学问的教师（等于pedagogue）
